Name: Best Miner
About the game: The miner, delving into the very bowels of the earth, found not what he wanted to see. Living monsters and the like inhabit the underworld. Armed with a miner's cannon and a pickaxe, turn them on and clear your way up. Best Miner - Top Down Shooter, with a lot of monsters and increasing difficulty from each passed game. Build a strategy, and by switching ranged and melee combat, destroy all enemies on your way. Features of the game: - Increasing Difficulty - Pixel-Art - Dynamic Music
